metadata.title: CVE-2018-13054 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - high
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Cinnamon 1.9.2 through 3.8.6. Thecinnamon-settings-users.py GUI runs as root and allows configuration of(for example) other users' icon files in _on_face_browse_menuitem_activatedand _on_face_menuitem_activated. These icon files are written to therespective user's $HOME/.face location. If an unprivileged user prepares asymlink pointing to an arbitrary location, then this location will beoverwritten with the icon content.

criterions.comment: cinnamon: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
